00027 namespace vrt {
00070   enum FileMode {
00072     FileMode_Read                      = 0x01,
00074     FileMode_ReadWrite                 = 0x03,
00076     FileMode_Write                     = 0x02,
00080     FileMode_ReadWriteSynchAll         = 0x33,
00084     FileMode_ReadWriteSynchData        = 0x13,
00091     FileMode_WriteSynchAll             = 0x32,
00098     FileMode_WriteSynchData            = 0x12
00099   };
00100 
00114   class BasicVRAFile : public AbstractVRAFile {
00115     private: string    fname; // The file name (not in URI form)
00116     private: FILE     *file;  // The underlying file
00117     private: FileMode  mode;  // The underlying mode
00118 
00120     public: ~BasicVRAFile () { }
00121 
00123     public: BasicVRAFile (const BasicVRAFile &f);
00124 
00132     public: BasicVRAFile (string fname, FileMode fmode, bool isSetSize=false,
00133                           bool isSetCRC=false, bool isStrict=false);
00134 
00135 
00136     protected: virtual void    open ();
00137     public:    virtual void    close ();
00138     protected: virtual void    flush (bool force);
00139     protected: virtual int64_t getFileLengthOS () const;
00140     protected: virtual int64_t getFileLengthRW () const;
00141     protected: virtual int32_t read (int64_t off, void *ptr, int32_t len) const;
00142     protected: virtual void    write (int64_t off, void *ptr, int32_t len, bool flush);
00143   };
00144 } END_NAMESPACE
